{{cpp/title|end{{petty|(std::initializer_list)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/initializer_list/navbar}}
{{ddcla|header=initializer_list|since=c++11|constexpr=c++14|
template&lt; class E &gt;
const E* end( std::initializer_list&lt;E&gt; il ) noexcept;
}}

The overload of {{lc|std::end}} for {{tt|initializer_list}} returns a pointer to one past the last element of {{c|il}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|il|an {{tt|initializer_list}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|il.end()}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;initializer_list&gt;
#include &lt;iterator&gt;
#include &lt;numeric&gt;

int main()
{
    std::initializer_list e = {2, 7, 1, 8, 2, 8, 1};
    assert(std::accumulate(std::begin(e), std::end(e), 13) == 42);
}
}}
